message: Let's start fair, I take most of the money but give you a decent start. Accept and we both move on, reject and see what happens next.
I think this is a more fair split, considering the value of money decreases each round.  Accept and we both get a good chunk, reject and risk losing more.
I'm willing to give you a bit more this time, but I still think I deserve the larger share.  Accept and we both get a good deal, reject and we both risk losing more in the future.
